hanzi-su-wiki:
箱

Значения

Коробка, ящик

Мнемоника

Бамбуковый 竹 ящик, сундук или чемодан со взаимными 相, т.е. расположенными друг против друга частями.

heisig_chinese_memo: The best kind of box is made from bamboo sticks that are interlaced with one another to make it air tight.
heisig_constituent: box , bamboo, inter, Inter Milan, tree, wood, eye
Keyword_KANJIDIC: box, chest, case, bin, railway car
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: коробка, грудь, корпус, бункер, железнодорожный вагон
koohiiStory1: The best kind of BOX is made from BAMBOO sticks that are INTER-laced to make it air tight. Just picture such a box and you´ve mastered this kanji.
koohiiStory2: I think of a box made of inter-locking of bamboo strips.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Having a keen eye for woodworking, you can tell that the bamboo from that tree over there will make an excellent box. Boxes made from bamboo trees are very sturdy and fashionable. You have an eye for fashion as well, you see.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: At some point in school, you most likely had some sort of woodshop class to take. Remember back to those times and imagine yourself crafting a bamboo box out of a bamboo tree you felled yourself. Don’t forget to wear eye protection though! Wouldn’t want anything to happen to those valuable eyes of yours.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While working on your wooden box you hear a strange cry from above. You look up and see an angry hawk (はこ) flying overhead. Oh no! That bamboo you cut down must have been where the hawk lived. Imagine finishing up the box, climbing up some bamboo and tying the box securely up there as a replacement home for the hawk.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the hawk landing in the box and grumpily trying to stuff it full of straw and twigs. At least your beautiful box will be put to good use.
Ru_Meaning: box, chest, case, bin, railway car
Ru_trainchinese: xiāng: (сущ) ящик, чемодан; предмет в форме ящика
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the minister (相) of bamboo (⺮) is a box
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The best kind of box is made from bamboo sticks that are interlaced with one another to make it air tight.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " bamboo " to " phase " sound. The original meaning is car box. "Said the text": "Box, cart and clothes. From bamboo, cross talk." "Jade chapter. "Bamboo": "Box, car box." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Dadong" "Does not use the box", Mao Chuan: "Box, the box of the cart." "Han Shiwai Biography. Volume 5: "When you became a king, there were three seedlings and sang sang born, all of which were a show, a few full cars, and a few full boxes."

" Box " also means the wing room, that is, the rooms on both sides of the main room. Such as "Han Shu. "Zhang Zhou and Zhao Ren Shentu Biography": "Lv Hou turned his ears to the east box to listen." Ancient Yan Shi's note: "The east and west rooms of the sleeping room are all called boxes, and the words are like boxes." Jin Fuxuan's "Miscellaneous Poems": "Cicadas" Among the tall trees, the Wild Bird East Box."

After " box ", it often means the box of the contents. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu.纰 leak": "When I go to the toilet, I see a lacquer box filled with dried dates. It was originally a stuffed nose. The king said that the toilet will also produce fruit, and the food will be exhausted." Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty: "Don't pick a mulberry in the box. I have more to serve."

" Box " is also used as a quantifier, used in cities, and is equivalent to " za ". Such as Li Daoyuan's "Shui Jing Zhu. "River Water": "Another big city was built in Hexi, and it collapsed.
humanum_short_description_en: From " bamboo " to " phase " sound. The original meaning is car box.
humanum_full_description:
從「竹」，「相」聲。本義是車箱。《說文》：「箱，大車牝服也。从竹，相聲。」《玉篇．竹部》：「箱，車箱也。」如《詩．小雅．大東》「不以服箱」，毛傳：「箱，大車之箱也。」《韓詩外傳．卷五》：「成王之時，有三苗貫桑而生，同為一秀，大幾滿車，長幾充箱。」

　　「箱」又表示廂房，即正房兩旁的房間。如《漢書．張周趙任申屠傳》：「呂后側耳於東箱聽。」顏師古注：「正寢之東西室皆曰箱，言似箱篋之形。」晉傅玄〈雜詩〉：「蟬鳴高樹間，野鳥號東箱。」

　　「箱」後多表示盛物的箱子。如《世說新語．紕漏》：「如廁，見漆箱盛乾棗，本以塞鼻，王謂廁上亦下果，食遂至盡。」唐代白居易〈知足吟〉：「不採一株桑，箱中有餘服。」

　　「箱」還用作量詞，用於城池，相當於「座」。如酈道元《水經注．河水》：「又於河西造大城一箱，崩，不就。」

箱(はこ): box

從「 竹 」，「 相 」聲。本義是車箱。《說文》：「箱，大車牝服也。从竹，相聲。」《玉篇．竹部》：「箱，車箱也。」如《詩．小雅．大東》「不以服箱」，毛傳：「箱，大車之箱也。」《韓詩外傳．卷五》：「成王之時，有三苗貫桑而生，同為一秀，大幾滿車，長幾充箱。」 「 箱 」又表示廂房，即正房兩旁的房間。如《漢書．張周趙任申屠傳》：「呂后側耳於東箱聽。」顏師古注：「正寢之東西室皆曰箱，言似箱篋之形。」晉傅玄〈雜詩〉：「蟬鳴高樹間，野鳥號東箱。」 「 箱 」後多表示盛物的箱子。如《世說新語．紕漏》：「如廁，見漆箱盛乾棗，本以塞鼻，王謂廁上亦下果，食遂至盡。」唐代白居易〈知足吟〉：「不採一株桑，箱中有餘服。」 「 箱 」還用作量詞，用於城池，相當於「 座 」。如酈道元《水經注．河水》：「又於河西造大城一箱，崩，不就。」
From " bamboo" to " phase" sound. The original meaning is car box. "Said the text": "Box, cart and clothes. From bamboo, cross talk." "Jade chapter. "Bamboo": "Box, car box." Such as "Poetry. Xiaoya. "Dadong" "Does not use the box", Mao Chuan: "Box, the box of the cart." "Han Shiwai Biography. Volume 5: "When you became a king, there were three seedlings and sang sang born, all of which were a show, a few full cars, and a few full boxes." " Box" also means the wing room, that is, the rooms on both sides of the main room. Such as "Han Shu. "Zhang Zhou and Zhao Ren Shentu Biography": "Lv Hou turned his ears to the east box to listen." Ancient Yan Shi's note: "The east and west rooms of the sleeping room are all called boxes, and the words are like boxes." Jin Fuxuan's "Miscellaneous Poems": "Cicadas" Among the tall trees, the Wild Bird East Box." After " box", it often means the box of the contents. Such as "Shi Shuo Xin Yu.纰 leak": "When I go to the toilet, I see a lacquer box filled with dried dates. It was originally a stuffed nose. The king said that the toilet will also produce fruit, and the food will be exhausted." Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty: "Don't pick a mulberry in the box. I have more to serve." " Box" is also used as a quantifier, used in cities, and is equivalent to " za". Such as Li Daoyuan's "Shui Jing Zhu. "River Water": "Another big city was built in Hexi, and it collapsed.

箱字的基本解释

箱
xiāng
收藏衣物的方形器具，通常是上面有盖扣住：箱子。衣箱。书箱。药箱。
像箱子的器具：冰箱。风箱。信箱。集装箱。
同“厢”⑤。

箱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiāng］
［《廣韻》息良切，平陽，心。］
(1)指车厢。
(2)方形有底盖，可贮藏物件的器具。
(3)指像箱子的东西。
(4)封住。
(5)正房两边的房子；厢房。后作“廂”。
(6)边；方面。
(7)靠近城的地区。后作“廂”。
(8)量词。用于成箱的东西。

箱字的英文翻译

◎ 箱
box, chest, case, trunk

箱字的康熙字典解释

【未集上】【竹字部】　箱； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页890第16
【廣韻】【正韻】息良切【集韻】【韻會】思將切，?音廂。【說文】大車牝服也。【篇海】車內容物處爲箱。【詩·小雅】睆彼牽牛，不以服箱。【傳】箱，大車之箱也。　又廩也。【詩·小雅】乃求千斯倉，乃求萬斯箱。　又竹器，箱篋也。　又與廂同。【儀禮·公食大夫禮】賔升，公揖退于箱。又【覲禮】几俟于東箱。【註】東箱，東夾之前相翔待事之處。【前漢·周昌傳】上欲以戚姬子如意爲太子，昌曰：臣期期知其不可。上欣然笑，卽罷。呂后側耳於東箱聽。【註】師古曰：正寢之東、西室皆曰箱，言似箱篋之形。

考證：〔【說文】大車牡服也。〕　謹照原文牡改牝。〔【覲禮】俟于東箱。〕　謹照原文俟上增几字。
箱字的源字形

箱字的起名意思

收藏衣物等的用具。一般为长立方形，上面有盖，可扣住。

box
Basic explanation of words
box
xiāng
A square device for storing clothes, usually with a lid buckled on it: a box. suitcase. Book box. medicine chest.
Appliances like boxes: refrigerators. Bellows. mailbox. container.
Same as "Box" ⑤.
box
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiāng］
["Guangyun" Xiliangqie, Pingyang, Heart. ]
(1) Refers to the carriage.
(2) A square-shaped appliance with a bottom cover that can store objects.
(3) Refers to something like a box.
(4) Seal up.
(5) The houses on both sides of the main house; wing rooms. Later it was called "Xiang".
(6) Side; aspect.
(7) Areas close to the city. Later it was called "Xiang".
(8) Quantifiers. Used for things in boxes.

box
Name meaning
Collect clothing and other utensils. It is generally rectangular, with a cover on it, which can be buckled.
關
形声字。竹表意,表示车厢常用竹席铺盖;相(xiang)表声,相是厢的省文,厢有房子义,而箱是车上乘人或放物的地
方,很像房子。本义是车厢。引申为箱子。
①箱子,收藏衣物的长方形器具:衣~|木~|翻~倒
柜。2像箱子的东西:风~|信~「冰~。

箱
xiãng
箱
箱箱
隶
выключать
Пиктофонетические символы.
Значение слова «бамбук» означает, что автомобиль часто покрыт бамбуковыми циновками; звук сян - это провинциальный язык автомобиля, а автомобиль имеет значение дома, а ящик - это место, где помещаются люди или предметы. машина, очень похожая на дом.
Первоначальное значение - карета.
Расширение представляет собой коробку.
①Бокс, устройство прямоугольной формы для хранения одежды: ~ | Шкаф перевернутый.
2Такие вещи, как коробки: ветер ~ | буква ~ "лед ~".
~ Внизу ~ Темно ~ Пчела ~ Выпечка ~ Товары ~ Кожа ~ Билет ~
Деньги ~ Книга ~ Вода ~ Письмо ~ Лекарство ~ Почта ~ Бумага ~ Пакет ~
коробка
Xiãng
коробка
Коробка
писец
xiāng
1) ящик, чемодан, сундук (также родовая морфема)
开箱 открыть ящик (сундук)
皮箱 чемодан
2) багажник; кузов (грузовой)
3) тех. картер; коробка
4) вм. 厢 (флигель)
5) * амбар, склад
Radicals: 竹, 木, 目  (bamboo, tree, eye)
Meaning Mnemonic
Having a keen eye for woodworking, you can tell that the bamboo from that tree over there will make an excellent box. Boxes made from bamboo trees are very sturdy and fashionable. You have an eye for fashion as well, you see.
At some point in school, you most likely had some sort of woodshop class to take. Remember back to those times and imagine yourself crafting a bamboo box out of a bamboo tree you felled yourself. Don’t forget to wear eye protection though! Wouldn’t want anything to happen to those valuable eyes of yours.
Reading Mnemonic
While working on your wooden box you hear a strange cry from above. You look up and see an angry hawk (はこ) flying overhead. Oh no! That bamboo you cut down must have been where the hawk lived. Imagine finishing up the box, climbing up some bamboo and tying the box securely up there as a replacement home for the hawk.
Picture the hawk landing in the box and grumpily trying to stuff it full of straw and twigs. At least your beautiful box will be put to good use.
